00018 #include <linspline.h>
00019 #include <boost/numeric/ublas/matrix.hpp>
00020 #include <boost/numeric/ublas/vector.hpp>
00021 #include <boost/numeric/ublas/vector_proxy.hpp>
00022 #include <linalg.h>
00023 #include <gsl/gsl_linalg.h>
00024 #include <iostream>
00025 
00026 namespace votca { namespace tools {
00027 
00028 using namespace std;
00029 
00030 void LinSpline::Interpolate(ub::vector<double> &x, ub::vector<double> &y)
00031 {
00032     if(x.size() != y.size())
00033         throw std::invalid_argument("error in LinSpline::Interpolate : sizes of vectors x and y do not match");
00034 
00035     const int N = x.size();
00036 
00037     // adjust the grid
00038     _r.resize(N);
00039     
00040     // copy the grid points into f
00041     _r = x;
00042     
00043     // LINEAR SPLINE: a(i) * x + b(i)
00044     // where i=number of interval
00045 
00046     // initialize vectors a,b
00047     a = ub::zero_vector<double>(N);
00048     b = ub::zero_vector<double>(N);
00049 
00050     // boundary conditions not applicable
00051     
00052     // calculate a,b for all intervals 0..(N-2), where interval
00053     // [x(i),x(i+1)] shall have number i (this means that the last interval
00054     // has number N-2)
00055     for (int i=0; i<N-1; i++) {
00056         a(i) = (y(i+1)-y(i))/(x(i+1)-x(i));
00057         b(i) = y(i)-a(i)*x(i);
00058     }
00059 }
00060 
00061 void LinSpline::Fit(ub::vector<double> &x, ub::vector<double> &y)
00062 {
00063     if(x.size() != y.size())
00064         throw std::invalid_argument("error in LinSpline::Fit : sizes of vectors x and y do not match");
00065 
00066     const int N = x.size();
00067     const int ngrid = _r.size();
00068 
00069     // construct the equation
00070     // A*u = b
00071     // The matrix A contains all conditions
00072     // s_i(x) = (y(i+1)-y(i)) * (x-r(i))/(r(i+1)-r(i)) + y(i)
00073     // where y(i) are the unknown values at grid points r(i), and
00074     // the condition y=s_i(x) is to be satisfied at all input points:
00075     // therefore b=y and u=vector of all unknown y(i)
00076     
00077     ub::matrix<double> A(N, ngrid);
00078     A = ub::zero_matrix<double>(N, ngrid);
00079     int interval;
00080 
00081     // construct matrix A
00082     for (int i=0; i<N; i++) {
00083         interval = getInterval(x(i));
00084         A(i,interval)   = 1 - (x(i)-_r(interval))/(_r(interval+1)-_r(interval));
00085         A(i,interval+1) = (x(i)-_r(interval))/(_r(interval+1)-_r(interval));
00086     }
00087 
00088     // now do a qr solve
00089     ub::vector<double> sol(ngrid);
00090     votca::tools::linalg_qrsolve(sol, A, y);
00091 
00092     // vector "sol" contains all y-values of fitted linear splines at each
00093     // interval border
00094     // get a(i) and b(i) for piecewise splines out of solution vector "sol"
00095     a = ub::zero_vector<double>(ngrid-1);
00096     b = ub::zero_vector<double>(ngrid-1);
00097     for (int i=0; i<ngrid-1; i++) {
00098         a(i) = (sol(i+1)-sol(i))/(_r(i+1)-_r(i));
00099         b(i) = -a(i)*_r(i) + sol(i);
00100     }
00101 }
00102
